message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $15,000. I believe it offers significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $10,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to negotiate, but $10,000 is too low. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could we agree on $11,000 for the product?
